mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and reduce heavy JavaScript to improve load times on mobile.
loadingSpeedTip: Minimize HTTP requests, compress images, and enable browser caching to improve load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve title tags, meta descriptions, and use proper header tags for better SEO visibility.
userExperienceTip: Ensure that interactive elements are easily tappable and improve navigation consistency.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and making the form fields clearer.
tips: Ensure the website is fully optimized for mobile viewing to enhance user engagement.
